title: ICE: "expected exactly one expression"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-macros
labels.description: Area: All kinds of macros (custom derive, macro_rules!, proc macros, ..)

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

body:
### Code ```Rust fn main() { let _ = #[test] (); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.50.0-nightly (1f5bc176b 2020-12-19) ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0658]: attributes on expressions are experimental --> ./src/test/compile-fail/cfg-non-opt-expr.rs:3:13 | 3 | let _ = #[test] (); | ^^^^^^^ | = note: see issue #15701 for more information = help: add `#![feature(stmt_expr_attributes)]` to the crate attributes to enable thread 'rustc' panicked at 'expected exactly one expression', compiler/rustc_expand/src/expand.rs:277:30 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-nightly (1f5bc176b 2020-12-19) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0658`. ```
Backtrace

``` error[E0658]: attributes on expressions are experimental --> ./src/test/compile-fail/cfg-non-opt-expr.rs:3:13 | 3 | let _ = #[test] (); | ^^^^^^^ | = note: see issue #15701 for more information = help: add `#![feature(stmt_expr_attributes)]` to the crate attributes to enable thread 'rustc' panicked at 'expected exactly one expression', compiler/rustc_expand/src/expand.rs:277:30 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f93b0be36c7 - start_thread 36: 0x7f93b0a05293 - __GI___clone 37: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.50.0-nightly (1f5bc176b 2020-12-19) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0658`. ```
